entry.title: 我的第一篇文章:hello from LishiPang
entry.content: 优秀的人，不是不合群，而是他们合群的人里面没有你

entry.title: There must be someone who lives the life you want to live
entry.content: Welcome to lilithpang! This is my first time try to open the blog. If you get any questions on how to built a website of blog when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on Github 文章目录1.哎呀这是第一个选项1哎呀胡胡你今天为神墨这么好看呢 胡胡图片请点击: Writing 2.哎呀这是第二个1I don't know how to create the other themes.. More info: Server 3.Generate static files1This is another themes google link: Generating 4.Deploy to remote sites1print "hello world" More info: Deployment
